title: My Female Sword Master, Who I Live With, Is So Cute That I’M Happy Every Day
alternative_title: 同居している剣聖の女師匠が可愛すぎて毎日幸せです ; Doukyo Shiteiru Kensei no Onna Shishou ga Kawaisugite Mainichi Shiawase Desu
status: 同居している剣聖の女師匠が可愛すぎて毎日幸せです ; Doukyo Shiteiru Kensei no Onna Shishou ga Kawaisugite Mainichi Shiawase Desu
description:
Description :
        Eugene Dawson, a boy who wants to become stronger,
is currently training under his master, Liza Parsandra, who is known as the Master of the Sword.
He is the strongest in physical strength, but his private life is a mess. He is happy every day with his cute master...
or so he thought, but her defenseless and sexy body and unconscious skinship make it impossible for him to train...!?
Can I really become stronger like this!?
